thread.title: How Humanity Is Threatened by Humans Themselves
thread.title_full: How Humanity Is Threatened by Humans Themselves

title: How Humanity Is Threatened by Humans Themselves
text: How Humanity Is Threatened by Humans Themselves 2/21/2017 3:05PM What lies ahead for the human species? Yuval Harari, author of "Homo Deus: A Brief History of Tomorrow," explores potential threats to the human race, as well as the possibility of immortality. In a follow-up to his best-seller, "Sapiens," he and WSJ's Tanya Rivero also discuss the questions posed by the rise of artificial intelligence. Photo: Getty
